thread.title: Louis Tomlinson And Liam Payne Pictured Squaring Up For A Fight - Yahoo Celebrity UK
thread.title_full: Louis Tomlinson And Liam Payne Pictured Squaring Up For A Fight - Yahoo Celebrity UK

title: Louis Tomlinson And Liam Payne Pictured Squaring Up For A Fight - Yahoo Celebrity UK
text:
stephaniesoteriou : 
But before a whole load of people work themselves into a frenzy, it was a JOKE - alright?! 
Louis Tomlinson and Liam Payne have once again laughed off this whole ‘shovegate’ scandal after Liam was accused of aggressively “shoving” his bandmate midway through a One Direction concert earlier this week, and many speculating that all was not well between our fave four boys. 
For the record, we always knew that it was just a bit of friendly banter . 
Anyways, after taking to his Twitter account yesterday afternoon to defend his bandmate , Louis has mocked the entire situation by sharing a photo of himself and Liam squaring up for a fight over on his Instagram page. 
Captioned with: “Watch your back @fakeliampayne”, the boys look glorious in black and white and the only things that we would change about the pic is that they’re: a) Not topless. 
B) Niall Horan is not in shot as referee 
and C) Harry Styles is not in shot as cheerleader. 
But other than those three minor alterations, we have to admit that the pic is pretty much on point. 
The boys were joking about having a bit of a fight before they landed in Scotland for the Glasgow gig of their On The Road Again Tour last night, with Louis kicking things off by tweeting: “you wouldn’t dare push me seriously lad ! You know the consequences ” 
After deciding that, actually, Liam isn’t a ‘lad’ and changing it to ‘boy’, Liam responded: “Don’t start me man ima bout to see you in like 4 minutes … Arm wrestleyo face”. 
To which 23-year-old Lou concluded with a whole load of emojis and the rather sinister/ sexy: “I’ll be waiting…” 
It’s a miracle we survived this conversation without spontaneously combusting, to be honest. 
A+ for the banters, boys, and please do keep it coming. Reblog
